summary: An experiment in genetic engineering turns harmless sheep into bloodthirsty killers that terrorize a sprawling New Zealand farm.
cast: Matthew Chamberlain|Nick Fenton|Sam Clarke|Eli Kent|Nathan Meister|Nick Blake|Oliver Driver|Danielle Mason|Peter Feeney|Glenis Levestam|Richard Chapman|Louis Sutherland|Tammy Davis|Tandi Wright|Ian Harcourt|James Ashcroft|Mick Rose|Kevin McTurk|Lucy Briant|Justin B. Carter|Deana Elvins|Luke Hawker|Jono Manks|Lewis Rowe|Peter Rutherford|Matthew Saville|Richard Whiteside|Min Windle|Tim Wong
title: Ovejas asesinas
